page.title: 16Life in a Convent.
page.content: The nun's worship follows the Monastic Office. Holy Communion at 0700 presided over by the resident Chaplain, usually a retired priest, Tierce & None at 0930, Vespers at 1800 and Compline at 2015. The sisters rise at 0600, breakfast after Communion and work about the house before and after Chapel until lunch at 1230, and in the afternoon until tea at 1630. The hour after tea is recreation time, and following Vespers they devotionially read until supper at 1915. After Compline the sisters are free to follow their own pursuits. Residents are free to join in the worship. Visitors are welcomed for Retreat - a time for rest and quiet contemplation. to pray and sort out problems. Sisters from other Orders regularly visit.
